description.value:
When you compound @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Panache]{Panache} with even more derring-do, it somehow tends to work out.

When you already have panache, you can roll twice and use the higher result on checks to which the circumstance bonus for having panache applies (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Tumble Through]{Tumble Through} and any skill actions listed in your swashbuckler's style).
